data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Parizotto, Daniele R. (2009): Taxonomic notes on Neotropical Anthidiini, with description of the male of Chrisanthidium adornatum Urban (Hymenoptera: Megachilinae) *. Zootaxa 2034: 49-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274764
